survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee participation and satisfaction with the current corporate wellness programs, identifying areas for improvement and potential new offerings.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the corporate wellness programs offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to gauge awareness levels.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the corporate wellness programs offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following wellness programs have you participated in during the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify popular programs.

script.question_text: Which of the following wellness programs have you participated in during the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the wellness programs currently offered?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any program in Q2 except 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.
